name: Right Wipe
description:
Quickly get rid of all that pesky dirt. Oh wait, there's more dirt over there!

Press a button to clean the window using your squeegee. Clean all of the dirt splotches under the time limit.

Credits

  • Salil T.: Programming, Game Design
  • Grace Ho: Game Design, Sprite Art
  • Martin Perina: Game Design

Made using crisp-game-lib.
